== Ubuntu Use ==

I've been with Ubuntu since early 2005, and currently dual-boot Ubuntu Jaunty and Windows 7 RC on my primary machine.

== Kentucky LoCo Team ==

* I'm an active member of the Kentucky LoCo Team, helping to spread Ubuntu throughout the Commonwealth.
* As Wiki Team leader, I help coordinate wiki maintainence for the Kentucky Team, and have made large contributions to the <nowiki>[[KentuckyTeam-KnowledgeBase|KnowledgeBase]]</nowiki>.
* Spearheaded the <nowiki>[[KentuckyTeam-CustomArtwork|CustomArtwork]]</nowiki> project and packaged the team's custom artwork packages.
